Name: Vacation Paradise: France Collector's Edition
About the game: Are you ready for another rendezvous to the most romantic place on earth… FRANCE. The breathtaking Eiffel tower, the classic Castles and historical Museums. French Alps, world class wineries and a treat for the literature lovers, trip to Shakespeare and company. Hit a new level at every location and play 8 minigames as you go along. All you’ve got to do is find stuff—match silhouettes, solve riddles, and spot objects. Make sure to collect all the fleur de lis and flags you see—there are 60 each—to unlock an Unlimited Mode and bonus minigames. Sounds fun? Go on, then. Start your French Vacation!
